name: Alien Environment
description:
I noticed that Alien Terrain Pack includes a premade Gaia Biome which makes it incredibly easy to create a new alien landscape. So I figured I'd generate this little weird island to see how it looks. 

v3 update - there's now a few animals that you can see wandering around, you cannot interact with them but the little ones will hunt the big ones. 

Controls

  • w/a/s/d - movement
  • space - jump
  • shift - run
  • ALT-F4 - Quit

Assets Used

  • Alien Terrain Pack by Daelonik Artworks
  • Gaia 2 by Procedural Worlds
  • Lucanops by PROTOFACTOR
  • Hipposaurus by PROTOFACTOR
